info.value:
Once upon a time there lived a wise king who wanted to marry off his favorite daughter. He wondered how he could find the right person. The king had an idea. He announced that anyone who wanted to marry the princess must fill up a whole room with a light thing very quickly.

Many men came with feathers, silk and so on. But all of them failed to fill up the room. The king became despaired. One day, a man came with nothing but a candle in his pocket. Finally, it was the light of the candle that filled up the whole room. The king was very happy because he had found the perfect match for his lovely daughter.
